verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ee Mungu ee Mungu nchi yote
itakusujudia na kukuimbia Bwana.
Italiimbia Jina Lako,
Jina Lako wewe Mtukufu.
Italiimbia Jina Lako,
Jina Lako wewe Mtukufu.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mpigieni Mungu
kelele za shangwe,
imbeni utukufu
wa jina jina lake.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tukuzeni sifa zake
mwambieni Mungu,
matendo yake yanatisha
yatisha kama nini.
